channel.title: Devops on Pierre Vincent
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Pierre Vincent

item.title: Patterns for zero-downtime deployments of large applications
item.description: For anybody starting a product today, the idea of deployments requiring downtime is ludicrous. The truth is, a lot of today’s products started their development more than a decade ago, with architectures reflecting a different set of practices and assumptions.

item.title: CODE Stockholm Highlights: Data-driven DevOps and raising the Continuous Delivery game
item.description: CODE Stockholm is a one-day conference centered on Continuous Delivery and the DevOps movement. Both aspects were well covered through keynotes and two tracks of great talks.
